snippet.title: EVERSPACE 2 | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
EVERSPACE™ 2 is a fast-paced single-player space shooter with deep exploration, tons of loot and RPG elements. Set in a persistent open world, it is driven by a captivating sci-fi story that picks up shortly after the events of the predecessor. More at https://everspace.game. 

Follow us on:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1128920/EVERSPACE_2/
https://www.facebook.com/everspace.game/ac
https://twitter.com/everspace_game 

"Hell Fighter" by Nuclear Winter officially licensed through Position Music.
